text:
The english side has both english and german. 

It looks like it is trying to show the german version instead of the english one.

text:
this seems correct. the sitetree falls back to the default language if a
document is not available in the selected language. can you double check this?
creator: gregor@apache.org

text:
The attachment shows that for the english sitetree (default language for lenya
1.2) there are some german pages shows. I am fairly certain whenI looked at this
that there were no missing english language pages.

Anyhow, looking at it now it all looks correct. I remember their was something
about hardlinked german language in something so this fix may have been a
contributing factor.

Looks fixed then ?
